ValidationRule.description: This validation rule is invoked, When the approval time exceeds the suitable time frame for a given approval time unit.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR ( AND(ISPICKVAL(ESA_Approval_Time_Unit__c, 'Days'), OR(ESA_Approval_Time__c > 366 || ESA_Approval_Time__c < 0)), AND(ISPICKVAL(ESA_Approval_Time_Unit__c, 'Week'), OR(ESA_Approval_Time__c > 52 || ESA_Approval_Time__c < 0)), AND(ISPICKVAL(ESA_Approval_Time_Unit__c, 'Month'), OR(ESA_Approval_Time__c > 12 || ESA_Approval_Time__c < 0)), CONTAINS(TEXT(ESA_Approval_Time__c), '.') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot be negative/decimal/ Must be a positive whole integer and Termination Date cannot exceed more than a Year.
